content.question: A. Define the concepts “centripetal force” and “centrifugal force.” B. Give a specific example of and explain a centripetal force that affects the viability of any of the states shown on the map above. C. With reference to a different specific example, explain a centrifugal force that affects the viability of any of the states shown on the map above.
